hero.title: About ABC Brass
hero.subtitle: Excellence in Forging Manufacturing Since 1998
hero.description: ABC Brass has been a leading forging manufacturer for over two decades, delivering precision-engineered components to diverse industries. Our commitment to quality and innovation drives our continued success in metal forging solutions.

meta.title: ABC Brass - Precision Forging Excellence Since 1998
meta.description: Premier forging manufacturer specializing in custom brass, steel, and copper components with advanced manufacturing capabilities and six sigma quality standards.

cta.title: Partner with Manufacturing Excellence
cta.subtitle: Transform Your Projects with Our Advanced Forging Solutions

items.title: Foundation
items.description: Established ABC Brass with a vision to provide high-quality forging solutions to industrial clients

items.title: First Major Expansion
items.description: Expanded manufacturing facility to 30,000 sq ft, introducing advanced cold forging technologies

items.title: Quality Certification
items.description: Achieved ISO 9001:2015 certification, demonstrating commitment to international quality standards

items.title: Technology Upgrade
items.description: Invested in state-of-the-art CNC machinery and precision forging equipment

items.title: Six Sigma Implementation
items.description: Successfully implemented Six Sigma methodology across manufacturing processes

items.title: Cold Forging Capabilities
items.description: Specialized cold forging equipment for precision metal component manufacturing
items.specifications: Capable of producing components from 5mm to 150mm in various materials

items.title: Quality Control Laboratory
items.description: Advanced metrology and quality assurance equipment for precise measurements
items.specifications: CMM, Spectroscopy, Hardness Testing, Dimensional Verification

items.content: ABC Brass is a leading forging manufacturer established in 1998, specializing in custom brass, steel, and copper components. With a 30,000 sq ft state-of-the-art facility and advanced manufacturing technologies, we serve diverse industrial clients with precision-engineered solutions.
highlights: Advanced CNC and Cold Forging Technologies

items.title: Engineering Design
items.description: Collaborative design phase with detailed client specifications and 3D modeling

items.title: Material Selection
items.description: Precise material sourcing and verification for optimal component performance

items.title: Precision Forging
items.description: Advanced cold and hot forging techniques applied with cutting-edge machinery

items.title: Comprehensive Quality Control
items.description: Rigorous inspection using advanced metrology and testing equipment

items.title: Surface Treatment
items.description: Precision finishing including polishing, coating, and surface enhancement

items.title: Packaging and Delivery
items.description: Secure packaging and timely delivery with comprehensive documentation
